response.original_title: Hard Hat Harry's: Race Cars and Monster Trucks
response.overview: Join Hard Hat Harry, the loveable genie, and his young friends for their exciting journeys into the world of trucks, planes, boats, and all kinds of vehicles on land, sea, air and space.
response.tagline: Hard Hat Harry is on the move--and he's taking you with him!
response.title: Hard Hat Harry's: Race Cars and Monster Trucks
